original_text: And thou shalt set in it settings of stones, even four rows of stones: the first row shall be a sardius, a topaz, and a carbuncle: this shall be the first row.
korean_text: 그것에 네 줄로 보석을 물리되 첫 줄은 홍보석 황옥 녹주옥이요

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt set in it settings of stones
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 그 안에 보석들의 세팅을 설치할지니

sentences.original_text: the first row shall be a sardius
this shall be the first row
